CWEs: CWE-209: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
CWE-117: Improper Output Neutralization for Logs
description: The function is vulnerable to information disclosure through error messages (CWE-209) as it outputs detailed error messages to the console which could potentially expose sensitive information. It is also vulnerable to log injection (CWE-117) as it directly logs user-supplied data without sanitization, which could be exploited to manipulate log data or inject malicious content.
